Text: Revaluations for August Board Meeting Cc Cindy Please send us the list of the curves that you will need to revalue our international assets for the August Board meeting Thanks Maureen

Top Al producersa note to keep you up to date in what our group is working on The metals group has requested inflation curves for the following countries Im helping them with producing a forward curve for aluminum Maureen Forwarded by Maureen RaymondLONECT on PM From Michael J NRON on PM GDT To Maureen CT cc Subject Top Al producers Maureen as requested Speak with you tomorrow Regards Michael

Breifing Ken Lay on President Bushs Tax Proposal Cc I was surprised at your comments in todays PRC meeting It must be my oversight for not sending you a copy of the briefing material that we provided Ken Lay for his trip to the White House I spoke with Steve Kean after the meeting and he was pleased with our groups contribution I thought you also had an opportunity to speak with Steve Maureen

Briefing Ken Lay Cc I would like to respond to the discussion that we had today It probably would have been more accurate to characterize my work for Ken Lay as a briefing rather than as a speech When I said I wrote a speech I meant I prepared presentation material for him to use for his speaking engagement I thought that writing a speech and preparing a presentation is OK to use interchangeably in the English language In my review I stated as an accomplishment I worked with the Chairman of Enron Ken Lay briefing him on President Bushs tax proposals helping him prepare for a trip to the White House along with Steve Kean However I think the results are the same Ken Lay and Steve Kean were pleased with our contribution To me this was an accomplishment not only for me but our group and I would hope The Reseach Department For you to say that my misuse of the English language undermines my credibility however is a bit strong and I do not agree I pride myself in is my honesty Maureen

FW Revaluations for August Board MeetingJust a note to keep you informed about the curves our group is working on for RACs revaluation of international assets for the August board meeting Original Message From Hudler Cindy Sent Wednesday June PM To Raymond Maureen Koepke Gwyn Subject FW Revaluations for August Board Meeting Importance High Maureen and Gwyn I just rcvd this data from Paddy Please note that this request is in addition to the requests for the Houston office Thanks Original Message From Thuraisingham Padmesh Sent Wednesday June AM To Hudler Cindy Subject RE Revaluations for August Board Meeting Cindy As requested below is the list of FX and inflation data we need in London for the Q revaluations US US CPI forecast UK GBPUSD FX curve Turkey TKLUSD FX curve Italy ITLUSD FX curve and CPI forecast Euroland EURUSD FX curve Switzerland CHFUSD FX curve and CPI forecast Poland PLNUSD FX curve and CPI forecast Regards Paddy Original Message From Hudler Cindy Sent June To Raymond Maureen Cc Gorte David Cangucu Andre Thuraisingham Padmesh Subject RE Revaluations for August Board Meeting Importance High Maureen Andre is going to look over the list of curves needed for the global assets August Board meeting one more time before I forward it to you He will make sure that we do not request FX and inflation CPIPPI etc curves when only one of the curves will actually be used in the valuation process and to determine which inflation index is needed Typically we receive both FX and inflation from you but both curves may not always be used I hope that we can give you some time savings by eliminating any nonessential requests For now this is the list of countries for which we will probably need the FX andor inflation curves I will send the specifics per Andre later today India Philippines Bolivia Jamaica Guatemala Venezuela Columbia Puerto Rico CPI only I need historical inflation data as well Panama Brazil we have current data already China we have current data already Euro inflation only I am not certain about the needs for the London UnderwritingIV group but will request the information from them if you have not done so already Thanks Cindy Original Message From Raymond Maureen Sent Tuesday June PM To Gorte David Hudler Cindy Cc Kaminski Vince J Koepke Gwyn Subject Revaluations for August Board Meeting David and Cindy Please send us the list of the curves that you will need to revalue our international assets for the August Board meeting Thanks Maureen
